London, B.T. Batsford, 1996, 8°, xvii-206 pp., 83 figg., 4 cartes et XVI pll. ISBN 0-7134-7047-X. £30.

I. Sources. - II. Crisis and Transition. - III. Barbarians and Bureaucrats. - IV. Recruitment. - V. Conditions of Service. - VI. Equipment. - VII. Fortifications. - VIII. Siege Warfare. - IX. The Morale of the Late Roman Army. - X. The End of the Army. - See p. 202: Index, s.v. Egypt.
